name: Dualotl
description:
The Game

"Dualotl"  is a platform videogame in which we will have to solve a series of puzzles as we advance towards our objective: to reach the other's area. We will control both characters at the same time and our objective will be to carry out the different tasks with both of them.

Controls

This videogame allows the possibility of playing with keyboard and controller. The various device specific controls will be the default controls for movement and jumping.

Features

Although there are games in which you control two characters solving puzzles, in this one we will have to take consideration of both of them at the same time to complete the levels, in addition to its characters and its original and innovative aesthetics.

How to play

The player's objective is to collect the key which allows you to release the other ajolotls. You will not be able to do this task alone, so you will have to complete it with the help of your partner.
